title: YouTube Creators for Storytelling Content
job_overview:
Our team is expanding! We're looking for talented video creators to join our content team and help bring compelling, story-driven YouTube videos to life.

You'll be collaborating with an experienced and passionate team, and this is a long-term opportunity with room for growth.

???? What You’ll Be Creating:

Engaging, narrative-style videos designed for YouTube

Storytelling-focused content with tools like Leonardo.AI, Claude.AI and Capcut

???? What We Offer:

???? Personal training and feedback to grow your skills
???? Consistent monthly payments via Payoneer or Revolut
???? Long-term, stable work
? Opportunity to become full-time if you’re a great fit

???? Requirements:

Must be able to produce compelling, story-driven videos

Strong attention to pacing, emotion, and flow

Must submit a 1-minute sample edit (you’ll receive instructions if shortlisted)

???? Interested?
If you’re excited to join a fast-paced team and help us tell powerful stories through video, we’d love to hear from you. Be sure to include the word ‘Banana’ in your application to show us you’ve read the full post.

?? Note: AI-generated applications will be automatically declined. We’re only looking for real, passionate creators.
